items.sentence: Tom usually goes to bed before his parents do.
Tom waited for Mary in front of the warehouse.
Tom walked away without waiting for an answer.
Tom has been trying to get a loan from a bank.
Tom has offered to help pay for the groceries.
I wonder if Tom is having as much fun as Mary.
I wonder whether or not Tom is as old as Mary.
I wonder whether or not the weather will hold.
Tom is going to get hurt if he\'s not careful.
I only wish I\'d been able to do more for Tom.
What would you like me to make you for dinner?
You know who Tom\'s girlfriend is, don\'t you?
We learned that the earth goes around the sun.
We need to do something about this right away.
We waited a long time, but the bus never came.
We want to hire somebody who can speak French.
I asked Tom to tell you that I wasn\'t coming.
Let\'s do this again. It\'s been a lot of fun.
Don\'t worry. Everything\'s going to work out.
Because of rain, we couldn\'t go to the beach.
